t: HOW CAN I CONTACT THE AMAZON BRAND TEAM?
s: Scroll all the way to the bottom and the last section is "Getting Help." In that section there is a link to contact the Amazon Brand Registry team regarding enrollment and a link to the Brand Registry Support team if you are already enrolled.

t: HOW TO CONTACT AMAZON BRAND REGISTRY | GOAT CONSULTING
s: March 8, 2023 - Getting in contact with Amazon brand registry support can be a bit challenging. Learn how to get in touch with them and get the support you need.

t: AMAZON TRANSPARENCY: COUNTERFEIT AND BRAND PROTECTION
s: If you meet all eligibility requirements, enroll your brand in the Transparency program. Use the same credentials you use to log in to the Brand Registry portal. If your brand is already enrolled, log in to the Transparency portal to enroll products and add users to your account.

t: AMAZON BRAND REGISTRY | SELL ON AMAZON
s: On the Account Health page, select Report abuse. If you don't have access to Seller Central, you can report issues using Brand Registry Support. Log in to your Brand Registry account and select Contact us from your homepage, then select Report a marketplace policy violation.

t: HOW DO YOU CONTACT BRAND OWNER

t: HELP & CONTACT US - AMAZON CUSTOMER SERVICE
s: Visit the Amazon Customer Service site to find answers to common problems, use online chat, or call customer service phone number at 1-888-280-4331 for support.

t: CONTACT BRAND MANUFACTURER - AMAZON CUSTOMER SERVICE
s: If the item has missing parts or ... brand's customer service department. Their customer service team is well equipped and will help troubleshoot the device and resolve your issues. If the product you have purchased is not performing as expected, please contact the manufacturer ...

November 26, 2024 - Amazon offers multiple lines of privately labeled products. These are available on Amazon.com, Amazon Fresh, Prime Pantry, Prime Now, Amazon Go, and Whole Foods Market. Amazon houses its in-house brand offerings under the “Our Brands” label, which is separate from exclusive brands.

t: AMAZON TESTS TOOL THAT LETS SOME BRANDS CONTACT SHOPPERS
s: April 23, 2021 - Amazon is piloting a tool that lets brands communicate directly with shoppers, in a departure from its historically tight control of customer data.

t: HOW TO CONTACT "BRAND" SUPPORT. SELLER SUPPORT HASN'T HELPED
s: This pattern has repeated for the last 2 days. Today, the product got delisted. It took an hour on the phone with support before they said they'd connect me to "Brand" but that "brand" didn't do chat, phone calls, or emails. How can I contact them? Does using an attorney help?
